data.title: Sweet video emerges as veteran actor Olu Jacobs celebrates 82nd birthday, wife Joke Silva celebrates (Watch)
data.meta_description: Sweet video emerges as veteran actor Olu Jacobs celebrates 82nd birthday, wife Joke Silva celebrates (Watch)
data.text:
- Advertisement -

Prayers and wishes have been pouring on the legendary movie star Olu Jacobs as he clocked 82 years old today, 11th July 2024.

His wife and veteran actress, Joke Silva celebrated the movie icon via her Instagram page as she shared a video documenting Olu Jacobsâ€™ childhood memories till date.

A part of the video showed the aged actor on his feet looking agile and happy as he talked to some people in the background.

It is worth noting that Jacobs has left an indelible mark on the Nigerian entertainment industry. His roles in numerous films and television shows have earned him accolades and a special place in the hearts of audiences both in Nigeria and around the world.

Although Olu Jacobs has been struggling with Dementia since 2021, but he remains well loved and respected. He and Joke Silva have been married since 1989, blessed with three kids.

Recently, the veteran had passed away. The actorâ€™s family had debunked the news with a video of the veteran getting a haircut from someone.
